opening_theme: #1: "Yume no sekai e (夢の世界へ)" by Emiko Shiratori (eps 1-52)
#2: "Omajinai no Uta (おまじないの歌)" by Ponpin-tai: Moomin-dani no Nakamatachi (ポンピン隊~ムーミン谷の仲間たち~) (eps 53-78)
ending_theme: #1: "Tooi Akogare (遠いあこがれ)" by Emiko Shiratori (eps 1-52)
#2: "Itsuka Suteki na Tabi (いつかすてきな旅)" by Emiko Shiratori (eps 53-78)
